title: Treat Your Feet: Nightly Ayurvedic Foot Rituals
author: Harish
excerpt: Nightly foot care—oil, massage, and restful rituals—helps heal cracked heels and improves sleep. Vetiver and sesame make an ideal restorative pair.
content:
The Power of Nightly Foot Care

Feet carry the weight of our day. Ayurveda recommends nightly nourishment to repair tissues, stimulate circulation, and calm the nervous system before sleep.

Vetiver & Sesame for Repair

  • Vetiver: Cooling, anti-inflammatory, and soothing for irritated skin.
  • Sesame Oil: Deeply nourishing and supportive for tissue regeneration.
  • Shea Butter: Protects and seals moisture overnight.

How to Use for Best Results

  1. Warm a small amount of cream in your hands.
  2. Massage into heels and soles for 3–5 minutes.
  3. Wear cotton socks overnight for deeper absorption.

When to See a Specialist

If cracks are deep, bleeding, or infected, consult a podiatrist. Topical creams aid mild-to-moderate conditions but don’t replace professional care for severe issues.

Shop Ayurvedic Foot Cream and treat your feet to nightly restoration.
